title: Texas City Police - Arrest of Christopher Shull by Officer Scott Harrell - Officer Scott Harrell's Complaints & IA Report

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) A copy of any and all complaint(s) received for the following officer: Officer Scott Harrell.

2) A copy of any and all Internal Affairs Report(s) and or Finding(s) for the following officer: Officer Scott Harrell.

3) A copy of any and all Disciplinary Record(s) for the following officer: Officer Scott Harrell.

4) A copy of any termination paperwork, or letter of resignation from the following officer: Officer Scott Harrell.

Excluded from this request:

a) Confidential information deemed protected by Texas Law, Statute or Attorney General Ruling.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Stuart Martin

title: Expense reports from Mayor Eric Adams Oct. 2023 trip to Mexico, Ecuador and Colombia

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All expense reports from Mayor Eric Adams Oct. 2023 trip to Mexico, Ecuador and Colombia. The records should include the date, description and amount of all expenses reported by the mayor and his team.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh
